About

Right now I am a Ph.D. student at Vanderbilt University, focusing on high energy physics. Motivated by interests in physics and computer science, I will continue breaking my limits.

This page is built based on Freelancer bootstrap theme, along with D3.js, a JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data.
